# Period.Overlaps method

Indicates whether both periods are overlapses.

```csharp
public bool Overlaps(Period anotherPeriod)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| anotherPeriod | Another period. |

## Return Value

true if is overlap; Otherwise, false.
